name: Juan Troy
description: Juan Troy, also known asEl Gallo, was a maintenance mechanic forMegabuilding H1in theHeywooddistrict ofNight City. El Gallo is attributed by thePadreas the reason that H1 hasn't collapsed or ground to a halt; however, he is know to have several issues with drugs, and is unstable. El Gallo has stolenscandium rodsfrom a corporation, ostensibly to repair the building's elevator.Vis tasked by the Padre to retrieve these rods, before El Gallo can misappropriate them in attempting to fix the elevator. Upon detection, El Gallo will confront V, and demand why they are there. Should V hold a high...
